project.description:
Job to replicate the steps documented on Publish I build but also for renaming an I as an S build, or renaming an M as an S or R build

When job is done, see next steps here: Release latest build to simrel

Builds, once pushed, are here:

  • 3.10.0
  • 3.9.4

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: build_alias
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: to publish an I build as milestone/RC/R, enter build_alias=S-3.10.0.M6 or R-3.9.4

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: renameSource
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
If you're renaming an S to an R, you need to specify the source folder to rename, eg., S-3.9.3RC4-20180302093744 ...
If not set, will assume a value like M-3.9.4-20180322133713

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: sendEmail
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If checked, email will be sent announcing this build.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rcfile=${HOME}/.buildermailrc if [[ -f ${rcfile} ]]; then mv ${rcfile} ${rcfile}.wtppublish.bak echo 'set from="\"WTP Releng\"<nboldt@redhat.com>"' > ${rcfile} else echo 'set from="\"WTP Releng\"<nboldt@redhat.com>"' > ${rcfile} fi
#0. compute strings suffix=${stream: -1} # I or M streamver=${stream%-*} # 3.10.0 or 3.9.3
# 1. move old/new builds out of the promote folder # TODO eventually we can skip this step? workdir=/shared/webtools/committers/wtp-R${streamver}-${suffix} tmpdir=${workdir}-tmp
cd ${workdir} mkdir -p ${tmpdir}; mv * ${tmpdir} mv ${tmpdir}/${timestamp} . # just include the one build we want to promote
# 2. delete old I-latest or M-latest contents latestdir=/home/data/httpd/download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/R${streamver}/I-latest mkdir -p ${latestdir}/ rm -fr ${latestdir}/* ${latestdir/I-latest/M-latest}
# add -r flag to update I-latest, -s for email if [[ ${sendEmail} == "true" ]]; then flags="vrdscap" else flags="vrdcap" fi
if [[ ! ${build_alias} ]]; then # 3. promote the build WITH email send cd /shared/webtools/releng.control && ./promote.sh -${flags} wtp-R${streamver}-${suffix} else # 3a. promote the build without email send cd /shared/webtools/releng.control && ./promote.sh -vdcap wtp-R${streamver}-${suffix}
# 3b. now rename & promote again cd ${workdir}/${timestamp} cp /shared/webtools/releng.control/renameBuild.sh . if [[ ${renameSource} ]]; then ./renameBuild.sh ${renameSource} ${build_alias}-${timestamp} else ./renameBuild.sh ${suffix}-${streamver}-${timestamp} ${build_alias}-${timestamp} fi rm -f renameBuild.sh cd /shared/webtools/releng.control && ./promote.sh -${flags} wtp-R${streamver}-${suffix} fi
# 4. put back the other builds cd ${workdir}/ mv ${tmpdir}/* . rmdir ${tmpdir}
if [[ -f ${rcfile}.wtppublish.bak ]]; then rm -f ${rcfile} mv ${rcfile}.wtppublish.bak ${rcfile} else rm -f ${rcfile} fi
# 5. if this was an M build, rename I-latest to M-latest if [[ ${suffix} == "M" ]]; then mv ${latestdir} ${latestdir/I-latest/M-latest} fi
# 5. release this new build into to the simrel aggregation # TODO script this?
